title: Completion of FATF action plans by Pakistan great achievement: COAS
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jun 17 (APP): Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa on Friday said the completion of the Financial Action Task Force’s (FATF) anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism and proliferation (AML/CFT) action plans by Pakistan is a great achievement.
The Director General Inter Services Public Relations Major General Babar Iftikhar shared the message of the Army Chief at his official Twitter handle.
Completion of FATF AML /CFT action plans by Pak is a great achievement. A monumental effort paving way 4 whitelisting. “Core cell @ GHQ which steered the national effort & civil – military team which synergised implementation of action plan made it possible, making Pak proud”COAS
— DG ISPR (@OfficialDGISPR) June 17, 2022
The Army Chief, “A monumental effort paving way 4 whitelisting. Core cell @ GHQ which steered the national effort and civil – military team which synergised implementation of action plan made it possible, making Pak proud”.
